author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a new type of WFs with suffix .515 to do the ECAL GPU vs. CPU validation. It also addresses an issue with the configuration raised during the review of #36742 .
Both changes are tracked in #37025.

The WF suffix .515 was chosen because the initially planned .513 is foreseen for a GPU with CPU fallback WF now.

#### PR validation:

Passes 11634.515 and validation histograms are produced.
title: ECAL DQM - Add WF .515 for ECAL GPU vs. CPU validation
